6101.name: Warping Compound Eye
6101.desc: When choosing Blessings after winning a battle, enhances all 1-star Blessings that appear.

6102.name: Fruit of the Alien Tree
6102.desc: After winning a battle, revives all downed characters in the current team and restores their HP to their Max HP. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered 1 time(s).

6103.name: Casket of Inaccuracy
6103.desc: Gains 1-2 random Blessings after obtaining this Curio.

6104.name: Ambergris Cheese
6104.desc: After winning a battle, all allies restore HP equal to 100% of their respective Max HP.

6105.name: The Parchment That Always Eats
6105.desc: Upon entering battle, all enemies receive a set amount of DMG equal to 30% of their respective Max HP.

6106.name: The Doctor's Robe
6106.desc: When entering battle with an expanded 3-star Equation, activates all characters' Ultimates and increases the DMG they deal by 25%.

6107.name: Society Ticket
6107.desc: Increases the number of Cosmic Fragments received after winning a battle by 75%.

6108.name: Faith Bond
6108.desc: Reduces the Cosmic Fragments required for Blessing Overwriting, Equation Overwriting, and for reviving downed characters by 30%.

6109.name: Void Wick Trimmer
6109.desc: After obtaining this Curio, randomly repairs up to 2 destroyed Curio(s) and restores their remaining uses to default.

6110.name: Record from Beyond the Sky
6110.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after they are attacked, and cannot be debuffed for 3 turn(s).

6111.name: Entropic Die
6111.desc: Randomly Enhances 2 Blessing(s) immediately after obtaining this Curio.

6112.name: Insect Web
6112.desc: Upon entering battle, the character currently with the highest ATK will become Parasitized. While Parasitized, the character's ATK increases by 50%, but will lose HP equal to 20% of their current HP at the start of every turn. When this character is knocked down, Parasitized will be transferred to a random character.

6113.name: Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser
6113.desc: Cosmic Fragments are not received upon winning battles. After triggering this effect 5 times, this Curio will be destroyed and the amount of Cosmic Fragment(s) currently held will be doubled.

6114.name: Laurel Crown of Planar Shifts
6114.desc: The current exploration will not terminate if your team is defeated in battle outside of a final domain. Instead, the battle will be considered as a victory, and all characters will recover HP up to their respective Max HP. After triggering this effect 1 time(s), this Curio will be destroyed.

6115.name: Omniscient Capsule
6115.desc: Destructible objects will appear more frequently and rewards obtained from them are doubled.

6117.name: Black Hole Trap
6117.desc: You will obtain 15 Cosmic Fragments for each ally whose HP is at max when winning a battle.

6118.name: Tonic of Efficacious Chaos
6118.desc: Increases DMG dealt by characters' Techniques by 200%. Technique DMG further increases by 200% of the Technique's respective character's Max HP.

6119.name: Rubert Empire Mechanical Cogwheel
6119.desc: You obtain 50 Cosmic Fragments each time you enter a domain. If the Cosmic Fragment you currently own exceeds 750, the Curio will be destroyed and all Cosmic Fragments you possess will be lost. Obtaining the Curio when simultaneously carrying all Rubert Empire-series Curios will trigger the Anti-Organic Equation's Regional Resonance

6120.name: Rubert Empire Mechanical Lever
6120.desc: You obtain 1 random Blessing(s) needed for the Equation and discard 1 random Blessing(s) unneeded by the Equation each time you enter a domain. If you don't have any Blessings that can be discarded in this way, this Curio will be destroyed. Obtaining the Curio when simultaneously carrying all Rubert Empire-series Curios will trigger the Anti-Organic Equation's Regional Resonance

6121.name: Rubert Empire Mechanical Piston
6121.desc: Obtain 2 random Curio(s) (with a possibility of gaining negative Curios) and discard 1 random Curio(s) each time you enter a domain. If you discard this Curio in this way, lose all Curios. Obtaining the Curio when simultaneously carrying all Rubert Empire-series Curios will trigger the Anti-Organic Equation's Regional Resonance

6122.name: Vile Mechanical Satellite #900
6122.desc: Reduces the prices for shop items in Store Domains by 30%

6123.name: Thalan Toxi-Flame
6123.desc: Upon entering battle, the character with the highest ATK consumes HP equal to 24% of their Max HP at the start of each turn. At the same time, their SPD increases by 5%, up to 5 times.

6124.name: The Pinkest Collision
6124.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies' Break Effect increases by 20% for every Blessing of a different Path possessed.

6125.name: Wish Upon a Star
6125.desc: Greatly increases the chances of Adventure Domains appearing. Bringing this Curio into an Adventure Domain will cause the domain's time limit to be increased by 50%, and you will receive an additional chest upon entering this domain. This Curio will be destroyed after the effect has been triggered 2 time(s).

6126.name: Price of Peace
6126.desc: Receives 150 Cosmic Fragments when entering a Store Domain

6127.name: "Jellyfish on the Staircase"
6127.desc: Lose all Blessings. Obtain Cosmic Fragments based on the sum of the stars on the Blessings lost. Obtain 150 Cosmic Fragments for each star on the Blessings lost.

6128.name: Indecipherable Box
6128.desc: At least 1 Blessing obtained after winning a battle will be of a Path required for the Equation

6129.name: Mysterious Magnetism
6129.desc: Obtain 50 Cosmic Fragments each time you enter a domain. After winning a battle, lose 50 Cosmic Fragments.

6130.name: "Organic Heart"
6130.desc: Additionally obtain 5000 challenge points during Excessive Conversion and increases DMG received by allied characters by 15%

6131.name: Self-Consciousness Relaxation
6131.desc: When entering battle, automatically enters auto-battle that cannot be turned off. The DMG dealt by all allies increases by 30% and Max HP increases by 30%.

6132.name: Shatterbone Blade
6132.desc: In the First and Second Planes, DMG received by all allies increases by 20%. In the Third Plane, DMG received by all allies reduces by 20%.

6133.name: Temporary Stake
6133.desc: Immediately obtain 300 Cosmic Fragments. After entering a total of 4 domain(s), this Curio will be destroyed, and 600 Cosmic Fragments will be lost.

6134.name: Struggling Color
6134.desc: When entering a domain, increase the chance for additional treasures to appear, and the additional treasure is guaranteed to be a Chaos Medicine Box

6135.name: Celesticomet Alloy
6135.desc: When obtaining this Curio, immediately obtain the Curios Celesticomet Alloy Type-I, Celesticomet Alloy Type-II, and Celesticomet Alloy Type-III.

6136.name: Celesticomet Alloy Type-I
6136.desc: No effect. Only 1 copy of this item can be possessed at any time

6137.name: Beacon Coloring Paste
6137.desc: When choosing a Blessing after winning a battle, randomly Enhance 1 Blessing(s) among the selection.

6138.name: Punklorde Mentality
6138.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a 100% fixed chance to add to all enemies 1 Weakness(es) of the same Type(s) as allies currently on the field. These Weakness(es) last(s) for 3 turn(s).

6201.name: Dimension Reduction Dice
6201.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, 1 extra Blessing(s) can be chosen, but the number of available Blessings will be reduced by 1. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered 2 time(s).

6203.name: Fortune Glue
6203.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, all Blessings that appear are guaranteed to be of 3-star rarity. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered 1 time(s).

6204.name: Gold Coin of Discord
6204.desc: Upon entering a new domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to 6% of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

6205.name: Shining Trapezohedron Die
6205.desc: Replaces all Curios currently in possession (including this Curio) with random 1-star or 2-star Curios

6206.name: Sealing Wax of Preservation
6206.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Preservation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Preservation to appear.

6207.name: Sealing Wax of Elation
6207.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Elation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Elation to appear.

6208.name: Sealing Wax of The Hunt
6208.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of The Hunt after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of The Hunt to appear.

6209.name: Sealing Wax of Destruction
6209.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Destruction after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Destruction to appear.

6210.name: Sealing Wax of Remembrance
6210.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Remembrance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Remembrance to appear.

6211.name: Sealing Wax of Nihility
6211.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Nihility after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Nihility to appear.

6212.name: Sealing Wax of Abundance
6212.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Abundance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Abundance to appear.

6213.name: Sealing Wax of Propagation
6213.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Propagation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is an increased chance for Blessings of Propagation to appear.

6214.name: Sealing Wax of Erudition
6214.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Erudition after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Erudition to appear.

6215.name: Shattered Star Bait
6215.desc: Increase Movement SPD by 20% when in the gameplay area. When entering combat, characters' SPD increases by 20%.

6216.name: Space-Time Prism
6216.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all allies' Eidolon Resonance level by 1.

6217.name: Cosmic Big Lotto
6217.desc: After destroying destructible objects, there is a small chance of receiving 1 Curio, but also a small chance of destroying this Curio and all characters losing 99% of their current HP.

6218.name: Silver Coin of Discord
6218.desc: Immediately gain Cosmic Fragments equal to 50% of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

6219.name: Interastral Big Lotto
6219.desc: After destroying destructible objects, there is a small chance of receiving 1 random Blessing, but also a small chance of destroying this Curio and causing all team members to lose all Energy and Technique Points.

6220.name: Typical Genius Society Gossip
6220.desc: After obtaining this Curio, Cosmic Fragments obtained will increase by 100%, but Blessings will no longer be obtained after combat.

6221.name: Fool's Mask
6221.desc: All Blessings in possession are swapped to random Blessings with their Enhancement levels retained, with a chance of being replaced by Blessings of higher rarity.

6222.name: Spirit of the Knights of Beauty
6222.desc: Obtains 1 random Equation(s) after obtaining this Curio

6223.name: Illusory Automaton
6223.desc: At the start of a character's turn, they restore HP equal to 20% of their Max HP.

6224.name: A Pinch of Bearded Gunpowder
6224.desc: Obtains 1 random Weighted Curio(s) after obtaining this Curio

6225.name: Man-Made Meteorite
6225.desc: After obtaining this Curio, immediately gain 1-3 Blessings for the Path that you currently possess the most Blessings.

6226.name: Rationality's Fall
6226.desc: After obtaining this Curio, immediately gain 1 Blessing(s) of 1-star rarity from 3 different Path(s).

6227.name: Rotting Fruit of the Alien Tree
6227.desc: Characters will resist all effects that cause them to be inflicted with Crowd Control debuffs. Every time they resist a debuff, they will consume HP equal to 20% of their Max HP

6228.name: King of Sponges
6228.desc: Every time you enter a domain, all allies will lose 80% of their current HP, while their Max HP are increased by 10%. This Curio will be destroyed after its effect has been triggered 4 times, and the Max HP bonus will take effect even after the Curio is destroyed.

6229.name: A-Ruan Pouch
6229.desc: Immediately obtains 3 random Blessings. After winning a battle, the selectable number of Blessings becomes 1. This Curio will be destroyed after 2 battles

6230.name: Punklordian Regards
6230.desc: When entering battle, the ally positioned first in the team lineup has their SPD increased by 40%, and the ally positioned last has their SPD decreased by 40%.

6231.name: Joyous Incense
6231.desc: Gains 2 random Equation(s) after obtaining this Curio. When entering a battle in a Boss Domain, increases all enemies' Max HP by 40% and ATK by 20% for every inactive Equation

6232.name: Celesticomet Alloy Type-II
6232.desc: No effect. Only 1 copy of this item can be possessed at any time

6234.name: Tawot Cards
6234.desc: Upon entering battle, all enemies have their actions delayed by 200%. This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 3 domains

6235.name: Tawot Cards
6235.desc: Upon entering battle, increases all allies' SPD by 30%. This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 3 domains

6236.name: Tawot Cards
6236.desc: Upon entering battle and after a character is attacked, restores their HP equal to 15% of their Max HP. This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 3 domains

6237.name: Tawot Cards
6237.desc: Upon entering battle and after a character is attacked, consumes 10 Energy, lasting for 5 turn(s). This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 3 domains

6238.name: Tawot Cards
6238.desc: Increases the amount of Cosmic Fragments received by 50%. This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 4 domains

6239.name: Tawot Cards
6239.desc: Increases the amount of Cosmic Fragments received by 100%. This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 3 domains

6240.name: Tawot Cards
6240.desc: Increases the amount of Cosmic Fragments received by 200%. This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 2 domains

6241.name: Tawot Cards
6241.desc: Decreases the amount of Cosmic Fragments received by 30%. This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 3 domains

6242.name: Tawot Cards
6242.desc: After winning a battle, receive 1 random Blessing(s). This Curio is destroyed after this effect is triggered 2 time(s)

6243.name: Tawot Cards
6243.desc: After consecutively entering the same kind of Domains, receive 1 random Blessing(s). This Curio is destroyed after this effect is triggered 3 time(s)

6244.name: Tawot Cards
6244.desc: After expanding 1 Equations, receive 2 random Blessing(s). This Curio is destroyed after this effect is triggered 2 time(s)

6245.name: Tawot Cards
6245.desc: This Curio is destroyed after entering a total of 3 domains, and lose 2 random Blessing(s)

6301.name: Robe of The Beauty
6301.desc: Upon entering battle, increase DMG dealt by all allies by 20% for every 100 Cosmic Fragment(s) you own. When entering Combat, Encounter, or Boss Domains, obtain Cosmic Fragments equal to 10% of the Cosmic Fragments you currently possess.

6302.name: Family Ties
6302.desc: Immediately obtain 1 destructible Curio. Every time Curios are destroyed, immediately obtain 1 destructible Curio. When entering battle, increase all allies' DMG dealt by 30% for every destroyed Curio in possession.

6303.name: Cavity System Model
6303.desc: Loses 50% of your Cosmic Fragments. Every time you enter a zone, lose 100 Cosmic Fragments. If you possess less than 100 Cosmic Fragments, destroy this Curio. For every 100 Cosmic Fragments lost due to the effect of this Curio, increase all allies' CRIT DMG by 36% when entering battle. The CRIT DMG boost will remain effective after this Curio has been destroyed.

6304.name: Obliteration Wick Trimmer
6304.desc: Upon entering battle, increases all allies' DMG by 5% for every destructible object that has been destroyed and increases all allies' Max HP by 8% with every treasure opened

6305.name: Memory Cycle
6305.desc: Immediately obtains 2 random Equation(s). When entering a domain, all Equations are replaced with random Equations. When entering battle, obtains the effects of all Equations that have not been expanded

6306.name: Plaguenest
6306.desc: For every Negative Curio in possession, increases all allies' DMG dealt by 30%. When you possess 2 or more Negative Curios, boosts from each Negative Curio become 40%. When you possess 6 or more Negative Curios, boosts from each Negative Curio become 50%

6307.name: Rubert Empire Difference Machine
6307.desc: Upon obtaining this Curio and every time you enter a domain, receive 300 Cosmic Fragments, 3 random Blessing(s), and 3 random Curio(s). When entering battle, increase all allies' CRIT Rate by 60% and CRIT DMG by 16%

6308.name: Reunion With Death
6308.desc: Immediately obtains 1 Equation(s) that cannot be expanded currently. After expanding 1 Equation, immediately obtain 1 random Equation that cannot be expanded currently. A maximum of 5 Equations can be obtained in this way. For every expanded Equation, increases all allies' DMG by 10%

6401.name: Divination Cuckoo Clock
6401.desc: When selecting Blessings after victory, the number of available Blessings will be reduced by 1.

6402.name: Black Forest Cuckoo Clock
6402.desc: Upon entering battle, randomly increases the chance for 1 character(s) to be attacked by enemies for 5 turn(s).

6403.name: Perpetual Motion Cuckoo Clock
6403.desc: Upon entering a new domain, lose 5% of all Cosmic Fragment(s) currently in possession.

6404.name: IPC Cuckoo Clock
6404.desc: Increases the amount of Cosmic Fragments required to overwrite Blessings and Equations by 25%

6405.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
6405.desc: Upon entering battle, consume 2 Skill Point(s).

6406.name: Broken Cuckoo Clock
6406.desc: Reduces Cosmic Fragments obtained after winning a battle by 50%. This Curio will be destroyed after 1 Equation(s) are activated

6407.name: Fission Cuckoo Clock
6407.desc: Reduces characters' ATK by 5% and grants a chance of splitting into a clone (with a max of 3 concurrent clones) after winning a battle

6411.name: "Cognito Invalidater" Codebuilder
6411.desc: When entering battle, characters lose Energy equal to their Max Energy

6412.name: "Cognito Averagifier" Communal Nexus
6412.desc: Increases the prices for shop items in Store Domains by 25%

6413.name: "Revelrous" Rainbowmaker
6413.desc: Bringing this Curio into an Adventure Domain will decrease the domain's time limit by 30%

6414.name: "Wildminder" Machine Cell
6414.desc: Additionally consumes 1 Technique Points when characters use their Technique

6415.name: Talot Doll
6415.desc: Upon entering battle, there's a 50% chance to select the wrong target when any ally uses their abilities on enemy targets. This Curio is destroyed after 4 battle(s).

6416.name: Celesticomet Alloy Type-III
6416.desc: No effect. Only 1 copy of this item can be possessed at any time

6418.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6418.desc: Upon entering battle, all enemies' actions are Advanced Forward by 100%

6419.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6419.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies have a 150% base chance to become Frozen for 1 turn(s)

6420.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6420.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies have a 150% base chance to become afflicted with Bleed for 5 turn(s). While Bleeding, receive Physical DoT equal to 20% of their respective Max HP at the start of the turn

6421.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6421.desc: Upon entering battle, after allies are attacked for the first time, additionally consume HP equal to 50% of the character's current HP

6422.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6422.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies consume HP equal to 50% of their current HP

6423.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6423.desc: Upon entering battle, DMG dealt by all allies decreases by 99% for 1 turn(s)

6424.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6424.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies' Weakness Break efficiency decreases by 100% for 1 turn(s)

6425.name: Absolute Failure Prescription
6425.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies lose all their Energy and consume all Skill Points

6501.name: Excess Nutrition
6501.desc: When characters receive healing from characters that follow the Path of Abundance, receive a stackable Shield equal to 100% of any excess healing. This Shield has a max strength of 50% of the Shielded character's Max HP. The Shield is removed at the end of the turn.

6502.name: Dignity and Passion
6502.desc: When there are characters following the Path of Preservation in the team, if any character is attacked and their HP is higher than 50%, prioritizes consuming their HP instead of Shield and converts 40% of their lost HP into Shield after getting attacked, lasting for 2 turn(s)

6503.name: Cumulous Steak
6503.desc: After characters following the Path of Destruction attack enemy targets that are currently Weakness Broken, trigger the Fire, Wind, Lightning, and Physical Break effects with a 80% ratio. The effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) every time the enemy target is Weakness Broken. When characters consume or restore health, their Break Effect increases by 25%, lasting for 1 turn(s)

6504.name: Lapispeakers' Flakes
6504.desc: Characters following the Paths of Destruction or Erudition will resist all effects that cast Crowd Control debuffs on them. When this effect is triggered, Advance the character's action by 50%

6505.name: Revitalization-310
6505.desc: After Nihility characters inflict a debuff, there is a 100% base chance to cause the target to gain 1 stack(s) of Embrittlement. This effect triggers a max of 1 time(s) on a single enemy target with each action

6506.name: Dreamdive Can
6506.desc: After non-Harmony characters perform their attacks, they will provide 1 stack(s) of Chord to random allied Harmony characters, up to a max of 15 stack(s)

6507.name: Parallel Universe Walkie-Talkie
6507.desc: After characters following the Path of Erudition or The Hunt use their Ultimate to deal DMG to the enemy target, they will be considered as having used a follow-up attack

6508.name: Most Raucous
6508.desc: When enemy targets are attacked by Fire characters and become Weakness Broken, their Toughness will regenerate 50% less the next time they recover from the Weakness Broken state

6509.name: Delicious Marimo Candy
6509.desc: After Physical characters use an attack and deal Ultimate DMG, restores all allies' HP equal to 30% of their respective Max HP. The attacking character's SPD also increases by 25%, lasting for 1 turn(s), up to 2 stack(s)

6510.name: First Journey
6510.desc: Lightning characters' Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 30%. After using an attack, the character's action will be Advanced Forward based on the actual Toughness reduced by this attack

6511.name: Divine Visage
6511.desc: After Physical or Fire characters deal Break DMG, they will deal a set amount of Additional DMG equal to 80% of the original DMG after the attack

6512.name: Genius' Confusion
6512.desc: Quantum characters' Ultimate and follow-up attack can reduce the enemy target's Toughness even against targets without Quantum Weakness, with the effect equal to 50% of the original attack's Toughness Reduction. The Entanglement state applied by Break will apply to all enemies, and its maximum stack increases to 25 stacks. For every enemy target attacked, the Entanglement state stacks on all attacked targets increase by 1

6513.name: Bud in the Wind
6513.desc: Wind Shear from Wind Weakness Break can no longer be dispelled and will last until the end of the battle, stacking up to 10 stacks. Every stack additionally reduces the afflicted target's DMG dealt by 3%, up to a maximum reduction of 30%

6514.name: Road to Comets
6514.desc: When Ice or Imaginary characters trigger the Weakness Break effect, additionally delay the enemy target's action by 50% and the DMG it receives increases by 20%, lasting until they recover from Weakness Break
